name: marine engine construction | marine engine | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17956/documentation

This dataset represents the construction of marine diesel engines used in fisheries and other marine applications, per 1000 kg of engine, based on an average marine engine composition.

Provision of materials, construction of marine diesel engines.

Metal works as proxy for the construction and assembly of all engine parts. End of life treatment. The Use phase of engines is modelled in the vessel's Use phase, by means of the activity "diesel, burned in fishing vessel".
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2811:Manufacture of engines and turbines, except aircraft, vehicle and cycle eng

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data based on literature on marine engine composition, as well as data from marine engine providers, contractors for vessel maintenance and refurbishing work, shipyard operators. Primary data on engines weight from 143 vessels;Reenaas, M. (2005). SOLIDE OXIDE FUEL CELL COMBINED WITH GAS TURBINE VERSUS DIESEL ENGINE AS AUXILIARY POWER PRODUCING UNIT. Master Dissertation.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Peru features various shipyards and relevant ship-building and ship-retrofitting expertise.
